subject: Crypto News. July 7, 2025.
body:
View this post on the web at https://www.cryptointegrat.com/p/crypto-news-july-7-2025

Vare Crypto News is live ft Bonk, Pumpfun, Trump, Kuru labs, Metaplanet
Defi
BONK is up 50%+ in the past week and 75% in the past 14 days, driven by a surge in meme trading on their letsbonk launchpad, bonkbot and Solana og symbolism 
BONK token launchpad, LetsBonk, overtook Pumpfun, on 24hr volume at $411M, compared to Pump’s $383M.
BONK recent Hackathon concluded, awarding $140K to first place, $50K to second, and $10K to third. Winner was BESTCOIN.
Meme coin production on LetsBonk is on an up trend with coins like USELESS going from $20M to $280M market cap, while IKUN 10x’d in 9 days, going from $0.0025 to $0.026.
BONKbot is the top fee generating bot on telegram, pulling in $4.35M/month, ahead of Trojan’s $4.21M. This will help Bonk’s rev 
All these catalysts are the causes of Bonk pump despite current market chaos lmao 
Pumpfun token sale to go live on exchanges on July 12. 150B PUMP tokens valued at $0.04 USDT
Paradigm led $11.5M Series A for Kuru Labs, building a dex Monad. Kuru uses a hybrid CLOB-AMM model, blending central limit order books with automated market makers to offer constant liquidity and native limit orders 
Japanese investment firm Metaplanet added 2,205 BTC to its balance sheet, spending $238.7M at an average price of $108,237 per BTC.
Bringing Metaplanet’s total holdings to 15,555 BTC, making it the 5th largest publicly listed corporate BTC holder.
Elon Musk said his new American Party will support Bitcoin “fiat is hopeless”
